Summary Michelle Kinsley is part of the Staffing & Recruitment team in Google Ireland, looking after sales people for the Central & Northern European territories. 
 
Michelle graduated from Edith Cowan University, Western Australia with a BA in Communications in 2005.  
 
She has over 7 years Recruitment experience in contingency recruitment and joined Google in July 2010. 
 
Previous to her current employment, Michelle worked for 3.5 years with Premier Group where she set up the Sales & Marketing desk and grew it exponentially over this period.  
 
If you have experience and are interested in a career move to Google Ireland and you have fluent English and a secondary language such as Danish, Finnish, Norwegian or Swedish then I am interested in seeing your CV. candidate experience project; delivering a pilot training with the goal to roll out a global ANS 
candidate solution to support both Recruiters and Nooglers, innovating these steps for recruiting and 
increasing the candidate experience after they accept an offer. 
* To expand the Staffing team’s lens from being req. focused to talent focused, created a Smart-card

candidate packets for 2011. Sr. Recruiter TiVo June 2006  –  June 2007  (1 year 1 month) In this project, TiVo's recruiting team was looking for a driven personality to provide:
